title: Canada men's national soccer team
summary: The Canada men's national soccer team (CanMNT; French: Ã‰quipe du Canada de soccer masculin)[2][3][4] represents Canada in men's international soccer competitions at the senior men's level officially since 1924. They are overseen by the Canadian Soccer Association and compete in the Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF).[5]
